Razmislimo korak za korakom.  First we will solve the problem for Kalinda alone and then add her mother's contribution later on.  
Kalinda can place 4 pieces per minute, so she needs 4 minutes to complete 12 pieces (the number of pieces in a full 360-piece puzzle). Therefore, it will take her 48 minutes to complete the entire puzzle by herself.  Now let's consider Kalinda's mother's contribution. Since she can place half as many pieces as Kalinda per minute, it will take her 24 minutes to complete her share of the puzzle. When added to the time it took Kalinda to complete the puzzle alone, it brings the total time needed to finish the puzzle to 72 minutes.

Razmislimo korak za korakom.  Po prvih informacijah ima Johnny $50 (denar + $10).  
Po drugih informacijah seznanemo, da so zneski vložili in se v enem letu potrojili. Torej lahko rečimo, da je znesek po enem letu $50 x 4 = $200.  Ta odgovor pa ne odgovara na originalno vprašanje, saj ni raziskano, kako velika je bila initialna količina denarja, ki jo je Johnny imel pred tem, ko je dodal $10.  Zato moramo ponoviti celoten račun in ugotoviti, koliko denarja je Johnny imel predtem, ko je dodal $10.  To bi moral biti $50 ($10 + $40), ker je bil prejšnji znesok $40.  Torej, po enim letu bo Johnny imel $50 x 4 = $200.
